game.name: Run Away
game.description:
This time no one but a cute and little green robot needs your help. Your excellent jumping abilities will definitely help you to guide him to complete all challenging missions. He is seen surrounded by an environment where lots of dangerous enemies exit. These deadly enemies will try to stop you from moving forward. No need to be scared of at all and try to help him to escape from a place that is full of deadly traps in this brand new adventure game.

The controls are very simple; gameplay looks seamless while the graphics are worth watching. Try to challenge your hand-eye coordination skills and escaping abilities to the test to complete all 30 levels of this html5 platform game! Pause your game anytime when you want by looking at the button shown on the top right corner of the screen! Your enemies are very clever and spot you immediately if you come in front of them. Fight them hard when you meet them in this challenging avoidance platformer!

If you stuck with the gameplay or are feeling bored, feel free to check out the other popular titles in the category of adventure games for boys. The best part is all our games are free to play online and easily accessible from multiple devices â€“ be it a mobile phone, desktop, tablet and iPhone or iPad. All you need to do is just have a device with a proper internet connectivity to enter the real fun of adventure challenges!
